name: Boundary Breakers
description:
A prototype platformer. Jump between dimensions to reach the flag. Be careful not to fall into the void or get yourself stuck in the walls or floors.

Controls
Click and drag the viewpoints around to move them around and reveal more of the level
A/D or J/L or arrow keys: Move left and right
Space bar: Jump
R: Reset the current level
M: Toggle the music

Resources used
All art assets are from https://kenney.nl/assets
Fonts are taken from https://www.dafont.com/
Sound effects were generated using https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
Music was generated using https://www.beepbox.co/

This is an experimental game made for Mini Jam 121, where the limitation was Windows as a Mechanic. I was mostly interested in trialling a game mechanic I haven't seen much of elsewhere, so this project is a short prototype that I might develop further at some point. If you try it out, I hope you enjoy the concept.
